CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends 	bzip2 	g++ 	git 	libfontconfig 	make 	nasm 	python && 	curl -qo /tmp/maven.tar.gz http://apache.mirrors.ovh.net/ftp.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/${MVN_VER}/binaries/apache-maven-${MVN_VER}-bin.tar.gz && 	curl -qo /tmp/node.tar.gz https://nodejs.org/dist/${NODE_VER}/node-${NODE_VER}-linux-x64.tar.gz && 	tar zxvf /tmp/maven.tar.gz -C /usr/local && 	tar zxvf /tmp/node.tar.gz -C /usr/local && 	ln -s /usr/local/*maven*/bin/mvn /usr/bin/mvn && 	ln -s /usr/local/node*/bin/node /usr/bin/node && 	ln -s /usr/local/node*/bin/npm /usr/bin/npm && 	npm install -g --allow-root yo bower grunt-cli gulp generator-angular && 	ln -s /usr/local/node*/bin/bower /usr/bin/bower && 	ln -s /usr/local/node*/bin/grunt /usr/bin/grunt && 	ln -s /usr/local/node*/bin/gulp /usr/bin/gulp && 	alias bower="bower --allow-root" && 	alias grunt="grunt --allow-root" && 	mkdir -p /root/.config/configstore && 	chmod 777 /root /root/.config /root/.config/configstore && 	apt-get clean && 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && 	rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
